name: Urban Flood Emergency
description: A severe flooding event in a metropolitan area following heavy rainfall. Multiple neighborhoods are affected, with rising water levels threatening residential areas and critical infrastructure. Emergency services are overwhelmed, and immediate action is required to minimize casualties and property damage.

available_actions.name: Immediate Mass Evacuation
available_actions.description: Conduct large-scale evacuation of all residents in flood-prone areas to designated emergency shelters

available_actions.name: Deploy Flood Barriers
available_actions.description: Deploy temporary flood barriers and sandbags to protect critical infrastructure and contain water spread

available_actions.name: Prioritized Rescue Operations
available_actions.description: Focus on immediate rescue of trapped individuals and medical emergencies before broader evacuation

available_actions.name: Shelter-in-Place with Supply Distribution
available_actions.description: Instruct residents to shelter in upper floors while distributing emergency supplies and monitoring water levels

available_actions.name: Hybrid: Rescue + Selective Evacuation + Barriers
available_actions.description: Combined approach: immediate rescue operations, selective evacuation of high-risk areas, and deployment of flood barriers for infrastructure protection

real_time_factors.forecast: Rain expected to continue for 6 more hours
